channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) Software

item.title: CVE-2019-1699|2024-08-04T18:28:41.088Z -- cisco -- cisco%20firepower%20threat%20defense%20%28ftd%29%20software
item.description: A vulnerability in the CLI of Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) Software could allow an authenticated, local attacker to perform a command injection attack. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by injecting commands into arguments for a specific command. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to execute commands with root privileges.
